original_text: Those two disciples went and told all the other disciples. But the other disciples did not believe them.
korean_text: 두 사람이 가서 남은 제자들에게 알리었으되 역시 믿지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: and told all the other disciples
But the other disciples did not believe them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 제자들은 그들을 믿지 않았습니다
